description:
Kabaton sets a sneaky trap for Mashiro and the others. Sora’s Mirage Pen is stolen by Kabaton and she’s no longer able to transform into Cure Sky.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`m a Hero Girl Too! Cure Prism`s Arrival!
Watashi mo Hero Girl! Cure Prism Toujou!!
わたしもヒーローガール! キュアプリズム登場!!
